DOC.brief_summary: This pilot , non-interventional , company-sponsored , multi-center study document observational data patient routine treatment Pulmonary Arterial Hypertension ( PAH ) inhale iloprost ( use I-Neb device inhalation ) . The plan study recruitment time 18 month . The maximum follow period study 12 month . The data collect patient initiated treatment mention ( inhaled iloprost use I-Neb device ) since February 1st , 2013 . Frequency visit procedure perform routine condition . The primary objective study assess compliance patient WHO/NYHA ( World Health Organization/New York Heart Association ) functional Class III Pulmonary Arterial Hypertension treat Inhaled Iloprost clinical practice , use I-neb Insight tool .
DOC.brief_title: Non-interventional Multi-center Study Patients Under Routine Treatment Pulmonary Arterial Hypertension ( PAH ) With Inhaled Iloprost Using I-Neb Device Inhalation
DOC.criteria: Adult patient ( age ≥ 18years old ) , male female Diagnosis Pulmonary Arterial Hypertension , Group I Dana Point Pulmonary Hypertension classification ( Diagnosis make discretion attend investigator , include mPAP ≥ 25 mmHg rest , measure right heart catheterization . ) The treat physician chosen initiate treatment inhale iloprost INeb device application , describe Summary Product characteristic ( SmPC ) . WHO/NYHA functional class III Willing participate study ( Informed Consent Sign ) Patients receive first inhale iloprost treatment INeb February 1st , 2013 . Any contraindication treatment Ventavis describe Summary Product characteristic ( SmPC ) Patients enrol treat inhaled iloprost INeb device application past , start observation period ( February 1st , 2013 )
